DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of a new 4-phasic preparation in the prevention of pregnancies in a large group of volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate Efficacy and Safety of a New Oral Contraceptive
DOC.detailed_description: The study has previously been posted by Schering AG, Germany. Schering AG, Germany has been renamed to Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany.Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Any condition that might interfere the outcomes
